input.label: Device:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval device="All devices" | eval address="*" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | lookup insteon_device_types category subcategory OUTPUT category_name description | eval device=case(address=="*", device, NOT isnull(name), name, NOT isnull(address), address, NOT isnull(device), device) | stats count(device) by device, address

input.label: Room:
input.populatingSearch: | stats count | eval room="*" | eval room_name="All rooms" | inputlookup append=t insteon_devices | eval room_name=if(isnull(room_name),room,room_name) | stats last(room_name) as room_name by room

search.query: sourcetype=insteon_plm (to=$form.device$ OR from=$form.device$) (to_room=$form.room$ OR from_room=$form.room$) `get_command_info` `override_command_with_custom` `lookup_all_link_group_annotation(command,from,to)` `lookup_all_link_group_annotation(command,from)` `populate_to_from_with_null` | eval options=cmd1.":".all_link_group.":".if(isnull(from),"",from).":".if(isnull(to),"",to) `use_non_null_field(from,from_device_name,from)` `use_non_null_field(to,to_device_name,to)` `override_empty_command_with_modem_command` `override_empty_command_with_raw` `get_status` `populate_field_with_all_link_group_number` | table _time status from to command options | sort -_time
